titles.title: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act
Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area in Colorado. Designates the Sangre de Cristo National Heritage Area Board of Directors as the management entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Board to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.
